Sample 1 Tests 
MOV R0, #7 // R0 = 7
MOV R1, #2 // R1 = 2
ADD R2, R1, R0, LSL#1 // R2 = 16
@00 1101000000000111
@01 1101000100000010
@02 1010000101001000
@03 1101001111111111
@04 1011001010000011
Output: 16

Test for LDR
MOV R0, #1 // R0 = 1
LDR R1, [R0, #2] // R1 = 3
ADD R2, R1, R0 // R2 = 4

@00 1101000000000001
@01 0110000000100010
@02 1010000001000001
@03 0000000000000011

Test for STR and LDR
MOV R0, #1 // R0 = 1
LDR R1, [R0, #7] // R1 = 3
ADD R2, R1, R0 // R2 = 4
STR R2, [R0, #8] // Output: 4
LDR R1, [R2, #5] // R1 = 4
ADD R2, R1, R0 // R2 = 5


@00 1101000000000001
@01 0110000000100111
@02 1010000001000001
@03 1000000001001000
@04 0110001000100101
@05 1010000101000000
@08 0000000000000011

Figure 6
MOV R0, X
LDR R1, [R0]
MOV R2, Y
STR R1, [R2]
HALT
X: 0xABCD
Y: 0x0000

@00 1101000000000101
@01 0110000000100000
@02 1101001000000110
@03 1000001000100000
@04 1110000000000000
@05 1010101111001101
